title: How to read novel at fast rate - Quora

response.answer_text: Practice makes a man perfect and a woman also !! read more novel..take up novels with simple english and plot rather than the ones which require more vocab or are complex with more characters and subplots..get a context on the story line on internet before starting the novel..you can even start skipping sentences and if you feel you have not understood something go back an read the last page again.... eventually these things will increase your speed.
